name: Hero and Monsters
description:
A simple game intended for kids who need to preserve the flower from the monsters by firing the appropriate colors.  Within the game, there are settings for adjustment of difficulty to the child's age and skills.

I intend to develop this game further, introducing new levels with shapes, numbers and letters, but probably only for the android, so if you are interested to play let me know  (down in comments) and you will get a copy of the game, which will be posted here as well. 

A mini devlog on the development progress will also be published.

***************************************************************************************

Music used in this game is "It Don't Mean A Thing"  by Geoff Love & His Orchestra

Original melody belongs to Duke Ellington recorded 1931.

*If the copyright owner objects to using this song and advises me accordingly, I will withdraw the song from the game.
